question: 108 . triangle a ’ s base is 20 % greater than the base of triangle b , and a ’ s height is 20 % less than the height of triangle b . the area of triangle a is what percent less or more than the area of triangle b ?
a searchlight on top of the watchtower makes 2 revolutions per minute . what is the probability that a man appearing near the tower will stay in the dark for at least 6 seconds ?

on a saturday night , each of the rooms at a certain motel was rented for either $ 40 or $ 60 . if 10 of the rooms that were rented for $ 60 had instead been rented for $ 40 , then the total rent the motel charged for that night would have been reduced by 50 percent . what was the total rent the motel actually charged for that night ?
a train 110 m long is running with a speed of 27 km / hr . in what time will it pass a man who is running at 6 km / hr in the direction opposite to that in which the train is going ?
if 15 ! / 3 ^ x is an integer , what is the greatest possible value of x ?
a candidate got 34 % of the votes polled and he lost to his rival by 640 votes . how many votes were cast ?

a piece of paper is in the shape of a right angled triangle and is cut along a line that is parallel to the hypotenuse , leaving a smaller triangle . there was a 35 % reduction in the length of the hypotenuse of the triangle . if the area of the original triangle was 34 square inches before the cut , what is the area ( in square inches ) of the smaller triangle ?
if a randomly selected non - negative single digit integer is added to { 2 , 3 , 5 , 8 } . what is the probability that the median of the set will increase but the range still remains the same ?

the average weight of a , b and c is 45 kg . if the average weight of a and b be 40 kg and that of b and c be 44 kg , then the weight of b is :

the profits of qrs company rose 35 % from march to april , then dropped 20 % from april to may , then rose 50 % from may to june . what was the percent increase for the whole quarter , from march to june ?
three numbers are in the ratio of 2 : 3 : 4 and their l . c . m . is 264 . what is their h . c . f . ?
a train moves at average speed of 40 kmph reaches its destination on time . what its average speed becomes 35 kmph , then it reaches its destination 15 late . find the length of the journey ?
10 people can write 55 book in 12 days working 8 hour a day . then in how many day 198 can be written by 48 people ?

mary works 9 hours per day on monday , wednesday and friday , and 5 hours per day on tuesday and thursday . she does not work on saturday and sunday . she earns $ 407 per week . how much does she earn in dollars per hour ?

in the storage room of a certain bakery , the ratio of sugar to flour is 5 to 2 , and the ratio of flour to baking soda is 10 to 1 . if there were 60 more pounds of baking soda in the room , the ratio of flour to baking soda would be 8 to 1 . how many pounds of sugar are stored in the room ?
if x and y are integers , what is the least positive number of 24 x + 16 y ?
a man is 28 years older than his son . in two years , his age will be twice the age of his son . the present age of the son is

a total of 520 players participated in a single tennis knock out tournament . what is the total number of matches played in the tournament ? ( knockout means if a player loses , he is out of the tournament ) . no match ends in a tie .

there were 35 students in a hostel . due to the admission of 7 new students , the expenses of mess were increased by 42 per day while the average expenditure per head diminished by 1 . what was the original expenditure of the mess ?

a , b , and c were to be paid in proportion to the part of work they did while working on the same piece of work . a and b individually can finish the piece of work in 12 days and 15 days respectively . they worked together for 5 days and then c completed the remaining work all alone . if $ 810 was the net sum to be paid for the entire work , what was the average daily wage of b ?
find the ratio in which rice at rs . 10.0 a kg be mixed with rice at rs . 5.70 a kg to produce a mixture worth rs . 6.30 a kg ?

a factory that employs 1000 assembly line workers pays each of these workers $ 5 per hour for the first 40 hours worked during a week and 1 ½ times that rate for hours worked in excess of 40 . what was the total payroll for the assembly - line workers for a week in which 30 percent of them worked 10 hours , 50 percent worked 40 hours , and the rest worked 50 hours ?
the sale price sarees listed for rs . 400 after successive discount is 20 % and 15 % is ?
a boat can travel with aspeed of 30 km / hr in still water . if the speed of the stream is 5 km / hr , find the time taken by the boat to go 70 km downstream .
how many seconds will a 450 m long train take to cross a man walking with a speed of 3 km / hr in the direction of the moving train if the speed of the train is 63 km / hr ?
if 2 / z = 2 / ( z + 1 ) + 2 / ( z + 64 ) which of these integers could be the value of z ?

bill made a profit of 10 % by selling a product . if he had purchased that product for 10 % less and sold it at a profit of 30 % , he would have received $ 70 more . what was his original selling price ?
by selling 95 pens , a trader gains the cost of 19 pens . find his gain percentage ?

in a garden , there are yellow and green flowers which are straight and curved . if the probability of picking a green flower is 2 / 3 and picking a straight flower is 1 / 2 , then what is the probability of picking a flower which is yellow and straight
in a kilometer race , a beats b by 40 meters or 10 seconds . what time does a take to complete the race ?
the sum of the present age of henry and jill is 33 . what is their present ages if 6 years ago henry was twice the age of jill ?
two trains running in opposite directions cross a man standing on the platform in 35 seconds and 28 seconds respectively and they cross each other in 32 seconds . the ratio of their speeds is :
if x is less than y by 40 % then y exceed x by :

solution x is 40 % chemical a and 60 % chemical b by volume . solution y is 50 % chemical a and 50 % chemical b by volume . if a mixture of x and y is 47 % chemical a , what percent of the mixture is solution x ?
if | x | = 4 x - 2 , then x = ?
subash can copy 50 pages in 10 hrs . subash and prakash together can copy 300 pages in 40 hours . in how much time prakash can copy 15 pages .
in a basketball game , tim scored 20 points more than joe , but only half as many points as ken . if the 3 players scored a combined total of 100 points , how many points did tim score ?
at a time a , do 20 % less work than b . if a do any work in 15 / 2 hour , then in how many hour b will finish work ?
what is the 26 th digit to the right of the decimal point in the decimal form of 6 / 11 ?
the duplicate ratio of 6 : 4 is ?
a circular garden is surrounded by a fence of negligible width along the boundary . if the length of the fence is 1 / 8 of th area of the garden . what is the radius of the circular garden ?
how many days per calendar year is the month a factor of the day
a man took a loan from a bank at the rate of 12 % p . a . simple interest . after 3 years he had to pay rs . 5400 interest only for the period . the principal amount borrowed by him was :

population of a city in 20004 was 1200000 . if in 2005 there isan increment of 15 % , in 2006 there is a decrements of 35 % and in 2007 there is an increment of 45 % , then find the population of city at the end of the year 2007

a dishonest milkman wants to make a profit on the selling of milk . he would like to mix water ( costing nothing ) with milk costing rs . 42 per litre so as to make a profit of 20 % on cost when he sells the resulting milk and water mixture for rs . 48 in what ratio should he mix the water and milk ?
what is the least number of squares tiles required to pave the floor of a room 8 m 82 cm long and 2 m 52 cm broad ?
the tax on a commodity is diminished by 20 % but its consumption is increased by 15 % . find the decrease percent in the revenue derived from it ?

the racing magic takes 40 seconds to circle the racing track once . the charging bull makes 40 rounds of the track in an hour . if they left the starting point together , how many minutes will it take for them to meet at the starting point for the second time ?
